HW 4 Bioinformatics in Python

# DNA PROBLEM. Counting DNA Nucleotides
s = ''
def count_bases(s):
    return s.count("A"), s.count("C"), s.count("G"), s.count("T")

print(count_bases(s))
(230, 205, 213, 200)

# RNA PROBLEM ID. Transcribing DNA into RNA
dna = ''

def transcribe(dna): 
  return dna.replace('T','U')

print(transcribe(dna))
